name: Pink Ball
description:
Eat balls and earn medals! Do you have the skill to achieve all 6?
Pink Ball is a minimalistic arcade style game made over a few weekends.

Click and drag anywhere to launch the pink ball

🟡 Eat the yellow balls 
🔴 Avoid the red balls
🔵 Eat the blue balls to activate HYPER MODE 
⚪ Balls are worth a lot of points in hyper mode 

I would be very happy to hear about your high score, feel free to leave a comment.

Good luck!
